title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, August 16, 1861
summary: Hotchkiss describes his continued search for a permanent appointment with the army, the presence of Yankees in Virginia, and discusses the treatment of sick soldiers by women.
keywords: Family, Troop Movement, Desertion/Leave, Military Authority, National Government, Death/Casualties, Women, Medicine/Hospitals, Home Front, American Civil War
